original_text: This is what the Lord said to me: “Go and buy a linen belt and put it around your waist, but do not let it touch water.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 내게 이르시되 너는 가서 베 띠를 사서 네 허리에 띠고 물에 적시지 말라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord said to me:
Go and buy a linen belt
and put it around your waist,
but do not let it touch water.
